articles.title: Marianne Williamson responds to Politico article alleging abuse toward staff - BBC
articles.description: The presidential candidate reacts on the BBC's Americast to allegations of staff mistreatment.
articles.content:
2024 Democratic presidential candidate Marianne Williamson has responded to allegations that she was verbally and emotionally abusive toward staff during her White House campaign four years ago.
